messages.subject: Re: Picture from Aizu Festival!!!! - Addendum
messages.msgSnippet: SK, Your pictures look fine ^_^ also I am working on fanart of Nakano Takeko of Aizu s Women s Brigade to commemorate this celebration in the castle town.
messages.messageBody:
SK,
Your pictures look fine ^_^
also I am working on fanart of Nakano Takeko of Aizu's Women's Brigade
to commemorate this celebration in the castle town.
Hino-shinsengumi.com club is EXTREMELY active and they have been
discussing their participation for weeks so I'm glad you got to see
them. Just so everyone knows after the memorial for Saitou, there is
going to be the 4th annual Shinsengumi symposium (aren't we all
envious?)...so this is happening on Sat 25 in Japan...around Friday
24th night time in the USA anyone with DSL should watch the streaming
movies at the Aizu/Fukushima website (go to shinsengumimb.com >>>
Shinsengumi History>>> AIZU to get the links).

secretarytocapt3
(^_^)

messages.subject: Re: Picture from Aizu Festival!!!! - Addendum
messages.msgSnippet: ... As I was unable to upload to the Aizu Festival album, I uploaded the pictures to the root album. They are the last three pictures. The first is a picture
messages.messageBody:
> Subject: Picture from Aizu Festival!!!!

As I was unable to upload to the Aizu Festival album,
I uploaded the pictures to the "root" album. They are
the last three pictures.

The first is a picture of the Aizu Shinsengumi parade.
There was another Shinsengumi people in the parade,
but they were from Hino, if I'm not mistaken.

The second picture is Yamamoto Koji (Hijikata
Toshizo).

The third is Sho Ei (Shimada Kai / Ginga Blue).



Serizawa Kamo
